description:
Reiji is a mysterious boy that http://anidb.net/ch57667 [Sei] met in town. Reiji is pushy, selfish, is quick to resort to violence, and doesn`t know much about common sense in society. Although he was pulled into Gundam plastic model battles for the first time, he shows excellent talent in piloting.
Source: ANN
name: Aria von Reiji Asuna
